list.name: Default
list.comment: Created a starting app XAnoS.py to start all other widgets within XAnoS. Updated PlotWidget to disable beam in the errorbar plots.

task.summary: Changed the name from SAXS_Drive to XAnoS
Changed the name from SAXS_Drive to XAnoS
Updated Documentation by changing the package name from SAXS_Drive to XAnoS
Rename calibrationWidget.py to Calibration_Widget.py and maskWidget.py MaskWidget.py. Accordingly changed the imports of Data_Reduction_Client.py
Commented out 'choices' option in fixedParameters of Fit_Widget
Made the logscale errorbar plotting in PlotWidget to work with pyqtgraph.ErrorBarItem
Add the beam in the errorbar plotting within the PlotWidget to work with pyqtgraph.ErrorBarItem
Created a starting app XAnoS.py to start all other widgets within XAnoS. Updated PlotWidget to disable beam in the errorbar plots.
